Comments.Message:
Hi,

For those who need this adapter, it could be helpful to know that there is a blog post explaining how to create a Ribbon RegionAdapter here:

http://blogs.msdn.com/b/mtcmuc/archive/2010/12/01/how-to-prism-ribbon-regionadapter.aspx

The post is in German, but it provides a sample solution that could be useful regardless of whether you understand the language.

I hope you find this helpful.
